mapper.select: select p.url,p.code from st_permission_relation r left join st_permission p on r.permission_id=p.id where r.account_id=#{accountId} union select p.url,p.code from st_organization o left join st_permission_relation r on o.hospital_id=r.account_id left join st_permission p on r.permission_id=p.id where o.id=#{accountId} and type=3
